transcript:
Customer: Guru Narayan roop hai, guru gyan ko ghat.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Good morning sir, Mayank baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se aapka account manager.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Haan, yeh sir aapne service ke liye request daali thi na, aapko woh call kar rahe the, haan bataiye kya issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Awaaz bahut low aa rahi hai aapki.
Executive: Haan sir aapko ab aa rahi hai meri awaaz clear?
Customer: Haan ab aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji sir bataiye kya issue aa raha tha aapko sir yeh aapki jo matlab aap mujhe call kar rahe the na kal.
Customer: Woh helpline pe aise call kiye the ki Mayank bhai aapne yearly ka bataya nahi tha humko, hum lead consume, humko Thursday, Wednesday ko bole the lead consume karo, lead consume karo ek baar ka.
Customer: Fir hum lead consume kare toh usme yearly ke kitne leads dete hai aap, five leads batate hai.
Executive: Ek minute sir ek minute sabko.
Customer: Abhi balance mein.
Executive: Haan lead kitne milte hai, theek hai.
Executive: Haan aapko sir jo monthly buyleads milti hai, jo aapko weekly milti hai na aapko, woh buyleads aapko, main kya bata raha hu aapko 10 buyleads hai na.
Customer: Haan ji yearly leads kitne dete hai aap, haan ji ji.
Executive: Monthly ki weekly?
Customer: Yearly yearly.
Executive: Yearly?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yearly lead aapki, isme na sir kitni ho rahi hai, yeh aapki ho rahi hai, 64 aapki monthly ho rahi hai na toh yeh aapki, samajh mein nahi aa raha aapke, main kya puch raha hu aapko, teen category bata raha hai usme.
Customer: Leads pe jayenge na aap, ek daily ki batata hai, ek weekly batata hai aur ek yearly batata hai.
Executive: Yearly wali sir yearly wali nahi milti, yearly wali aapko already di hai, yeh paanch yearly lead rahenge aapke paas, jaise maan lijiye aapko jo daily ki 10 milti hai na.
Executive: Aur weekly aapki 10 milti hai aur jo daily bonus milta hai, agar woh dono khatam ho jaate hai toh uske baad aap yeh yearly wali use kar sakte hai paanch buyleads, but yeh aapki ek saal tak lapse nahi hoti hai, jo weekly aur daily hoti hai woh wali lapse ho jaati hai aapki.
Customer: Hello, dete 10 hai na yearly wali?
Executive: Yearly wali paanch bachi hai sir aapki abhi.
Customer: Nahi bachi toh paanch hai dete kitni hai aap?
Executive: Paanch aap.
Customer: Woh sir aapki jab ya toh aap purchase karte hai, waise hum dete nahi hai woh, woh aapko jab aapko complimentary milti hai woh.
Customer: Hello, aap do baaton ko confuse mat karo mere ko.
Customer: Main jo puch raha hu simple question puch raha hu jaise ki aap monthly, weekly ke 10 lead de rahe hai, barabar hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aur daily ka ek bonus lead de rahe hai aap.
Executive: Nahi dete sir yearly ki complimentary milti hai jo aapko sales person ne di hogi.
Customer: Toh hum aur aap bole toh hum toh IndiaMART se jude hai na hum aur aap kya hota hai isme?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART ki taraf se jo yearly wali leads hoti hai na woh aapko khali complimentary mein milti hai jab aap service lete hai ya toh aap maan lijiye aapke weekly wali bhi 10 leads hai woh bhi khatam ho gayi aur aapka daily bonus hai woh bhi khatam ho gaya, ab aapko koi buylead consume karni hai toh uske liye aap jab woh lead purchase karenge na usme jab lead khatam ho jaati hai toh aapke paas purchase ka option aa jaata hai ki buylead ka pack kharidiye toh woh wali buylead aapki yearly mein show hongi.
Customer: Jo aap waha se kharidenge.
Customer: Nahi main kya puch raha hu aapko, hello Mayank bhai.
Executive: Haan ji ji ji.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji ji ji.
Customer: Main kya puch raha hu aapko, yeh abhi paanch leads bata rahi yearly category mein.
Executive: Haan aapki yearly.
Customer: Haan?
Customer: Dikha rahi hai na?
Executive: Haan haan ji ji dikha rahi hai.
Customer: Toh yeh actually di kitni gayi hai humko, 10 di gayi hai, 50 di gayi hai ya paanch hi di gayi hai yeh puch raha hu main toh.
Executive: Achcha kitni di gayi thi aapko, ek minute sir ek minute hold kijiye.
Executive: Hold kijiye sir.
Customer: Haan main line pe hu.
Executive: Ek minute sorry hold par daal sakte hai ek minute.
Executive: Hold kijiye sir main check kar raha hu abhi.
Customer: Haan main line pe hu Mayank bhai, aap aaram se lijiye.
Executive: Sir yeh aapko 10 mili hai sir yeh.
Customer: Toh 10 mein se paanch kaise chali gayi fir hamari?
Executive: Sir paanch aapne consume kar chuke hai.
Customer: Nahi yeh toh bataya nahi na humko aapne kabhi.
Customer: Aapne yearly lead ke bare mein koi baat nahi, itna update diya aapne kuch mere ko.
Executive: Sir main aapko wohi cheez toh keh raha hu ab maan lijiye meri pichle aap se jab baat hui thi maine aapko kya kaha tha ki jo aapke paas leads bachi hai aapko daily ek bonus lead milti hai, theek hai, aapko daily ek bonus toh mil raha hai, aap agar usse hatke ja kar consume karenge toh aapki jo yearly wali hogi usi mein se lapse hongi na aapki woh toh aapke uske.
Customer: Nahi bataya nahi yearly wali baat hi nahi hui, yearly wali baat hi nahi ki hai aapne.
Executive: Sir maine baat nahi ki but show toh ho rahi thi na usme main aapko fir se isliye bhi dikha raha hu.
Customer: Toh humko kya pata aapka menu thodi humko yaad hai kaunsa kidhar hum toh aise hi kal Sunday tha toh dono baith ke dekh rahe the main Arshit bole yeh yearly wali paanch kaunsi dikha rahi hai.
Customer: Tab jaake usne helpline ko baat ki Arshit ne.
Customer: Yeh aap aage bataya nahi na unka kya naam Sohel bhai kya naam unka unhone bataya tabhi.
Executive: Aapko toh sir already paanch toh bachi hai na aapki abhi yearly wali.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh aap usko 10 ko 10 dijiye hum humko jab zarurat hogi tab use karenge yearly wali hai toh humko kya pata aapka yeh option hai isme bolke.
Customer: Aap bol rahe consume karo lead consume karo aur ek aur ek baat mere ko bolni hai jaise Mayank bhai main aapko start mein bhi bola aur Sohel bhai ko bhi bola main aapko nahi bol raha hu indirectly matlab iska humko wholesale mein interest hai.
Customer: Zyada tar lead aapki hai na do teen 10 30 50 piece aise wali zyada dikhti hai.
Customer: Hum jo purchase karna chahte hai na bulk wali matlab minimum 200 piece wali chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Minimum 200 piece wali.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir abhi dekhiye open kijiye cotton bath towel aa raha hai 500 se 500 sorry 28 piece 58 piece aa rahe hai isme.
Customer: Nahi nahi Mayank bhai woh bhi abhi abhi beech mein aati hai hum kal raat mein bhi do use kiye hai.
Customer: Do raat mein hum consume kiye hai jawab bhi nahi hota abhi dekho kam se kam humne 15 20 logo se logo se.
Executive: Sir dekhiye sir ji ji ji main aapki baat samajh gaya ki aapne business jo hai wholesale mein karna hai uske liye aapne yeh service li hai wholesale mein karna chahte ho main aapki baat samajh gaya ki 200 se 250.
Customer: Nahi mere ko day one se yahi bola gaya hai ki hamara jo platform hai IndiaMART ka woh wholesale ka hi platform hai.
Executive: Sir wholesale ka hi hai but wholesale mein sir dekhiye 50 se zyada piece wholesale mein hi aate hai ab aap direct 200 ki demand karenge toh 200 jo demand hogi uski.
Customer: Day one se mera yahi bolna hai ke hamari towel ki jo gathar hai na 180 piece hamari mal ki 180 piece aur halki mal ki 300 piece.
Customer: Yeh hamari rate hai ek bale packing toh karunga nahi main bataiye mere ko chote chote parcel kahan banenge hamare yaha woh nahi hota.
Executive: Ek gathan ka toh kaam hona hi chahiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about the number of yearly leads.

- Wants leads for wholesale business.



Resolution:

- Explained yearly leads are complimentary.

- Explained how to purchase buyleads.

- Executive said he understood customer's wholesale business needs.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, yearly leads, wholesale
